agency_desc: Coordinates emergency management programs and response measures in Warren County.
service_description: Offers weather alert radios to Warren County persons in need, while supplies last. Weather alert radios provide information for emergencies including hazardous weather, local area warnings, and current weather conditions from the National Weather Service.
site_details: Call for availability or to make a request.
site_eligibility: Living in Warren County

agency_desc: Coordinates emergency management programs and response measures in Warren County.
service_description: Responds during a disaster or large-scale emergency in Warren County, assists with the recovery efforts afterwards, and takes steps to prevent or lessen the effects of future disasters. Offers sandbags to Warren County households during times of flooding.
site_details: Call for information. For emergency assistance, call 9-1-1.
site_schedule: Office: vary -- After-hours Emergencies: On call, daily 24 hours
site_eligibility: Open; serves Warren County

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement services and maintains the correctional facility for Warren County.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime prevention, and criminal investigation services and administers county correctional facilities in Warren County. Operates a 24-hour dispatch service for police officers, firefighters, and medics (ambulances) in Warren County. A ten-digit dispatch number is provided for nonemergency dispatch calls. For emergency assistance, persons should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency police, fire, or medical assistance. For nonemergency requests or reports, call the office during normal business hours. nonemergency dispatch number.
site_eligibility: Open; serves Warren County

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement services and maintains the correctional facility for Warren County.
service_description: Maintains the Warren County correctional institution used to detain persons who are in lawful custody, including accused persons awaiting trial and those who have been convicted of a crime and are serving a sentence of less than one year.
site_details: Call or visit the website for scheduling details.
site_eligibility: To visit: Must be on the inmate's approved visitor list -- Age 18 or older (or accompanied by someone over 18 who is also on the inmate's   visitor list)

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Warren County.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Warren County, including performing the following duties: Controls, maintains, and supervises county property -- Audits and authorizes claims against the county -- Receives bids for and authorizes county contracts -- Performs certain election functions -- Handles appeals of township trustee decisions
site_details: Call for assistance
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: Monthly 1st and 3rd Mon 8:30am
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Warren County.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority for Warren County, including performing the following duties: Controls, maintains, and supervises county property -- Audits and authorizes claims against the county -- Receives bids for and authorizes county contracts -- Performs certain election functions -- Handles appeals of township trustee decisions
site_details: Call for assistance
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Board Meetings: Monthly 1st and 3rd Mon 8:30am
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.
site_details: Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.
site_details: Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.

site_details: Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

service_description: Issues, provides, and maintains marriage licenses issued in the county. No witnesses, blood tests, or waiting period are required to obtain one. Both applicants must appear at the time of application. Marriages must take place within 60 days of the marriage license being issued.
site_details: Walk in. Marriage license forms may be completed in advance online or in the clerk's office.
site_eligibility: Marriage license: Both parties at least age 18 (call or visit website for exceptions) -- At least one applicant from this county -OR- both from out of state -- Certified copies: License must have been issued in this county

service_description: Provides electric service to customers in Warren County and in portions of Benton, Tippecanoe, Vermillion, and White counties.
site_details: Call or walk in for assistance; bill can be paid online, in person, by mail, or by phone; a drop box is available at this location.
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 7:30am-4pm -- Outage Reporting: Daily 24 hours
site_eligibility: Addresses within set boundaries

agency_desc: Offers instruction as well as preparation for the high school equivalency test.
service_description: Offers instruction in basic reading, math, language arts, social studies, science, technology, life skills, and job readiness as well as preparation for the high school equivalency test. Late afternoon classes available throughout the year.
site_details: Call for information. -- Walk in to enroll with agency
site_eligibility: Age 16 or older -- Not enrolled in high school (documentation required for ages 16-17)

agency_desc: County veterans service officers are veterans employed by the county to act as liaisons with county residents for veteran issues, including but not limited to; providing forms, information, and assistance in obtaining state and federal veterans benefits.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Call to make appointment.
site_eligibility: Living in Warren County -- Veterans and surviving spouses and children of veterans

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Provides probation services for the Warren County Circuit and Superior Courts, including supervising juvenile and adult offenders in the community and linking them with programs and services to support their rehabilitation.
site_details: Through the courts; call for details.
site_eligibility: Offenders assigned to probation by the Warren County Court

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Handles civil lawsuits for $10,000 or less, including contracts, collection of rent, evictions, and personal loans. Only corporations are required to be represented by an attorney and only on claims over $6,000. In Warren County, the Circuit Court handles small claims cases.
site_details: Walk in or visit the website for claim forms.
site_eligibility: To file a lawsuit: Age 18 or older -- With a civil claim for less than $10,000 -- Meeting one of the following three requirements: Person being sued lives or works in Warren County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit took place in Warren County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit was to be performed in Warren County

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Oversees both criminal and civil trials, including juvenile and family cases, in Warren County.
site_details: Varies; cases are generally initiated through the prosecutor's office, private attorneys -- individuals representing themselves. For juror information, contact the Warren County Clerk.
site_eligibility: Persons named in cases or called for jury duty at this court

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Oversees court cases involving Warren County minors, including petitions for emancipation, children in need of services (CHINS), and minors accused of delinquency or status offenses.
site_details: By court order; parents cannot self-refer children to juvenile court
site_eligibility: Warren County juveniles ages 17 and under

agency_desc: A commercial organization that provides home medical alert devices.
service_description: Provides electronic equipment which connects frail seniors or people who have disabilities with police or other emergency response personnel after a fall, injury, or other medical emergencies.  Electronic devices that can be rented include Personal Emergency Response Systems (PERS) for home or mobile units with GPS tracking, and Auto Fall Sensors.  Additional features that are available include smoke, fire, or carbon monoxide detectors.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Individuals at risk of falls or other injuries -- Individuals at risk of isolation
